duties_responsibilities.duty: Set up, operate, and breakdown intermediate audiovisual equipment in a hospitality environment.
Troubleshoot technical issues and resolve problems quickly.
Provide excellent service and exceed the expectations of internal and external customers.
Understand and demonstrate advanced operational ability to troubleshoot and problem solve with equipment and software issues.
Follow procedures, complete systems entry and paperwork accurately.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma required, Associate's Degree is preferred. Technical 1-Star Certification required for internal applicants.
